price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߠߋ߫ ߖߏ߬ߛߌ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߊ߬ ߘߌߦߴߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬، ߟߍߙߊ ߓߊߞߘߐ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߓߟߏ߫
arabic: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
